game.name: Inca Challenge
game.description:
Training memory is something that is also good for your health. We have brought to you a brand new arcade game where you will get a chance to challenge your memory with multiple Inca symbols. Does not sound it pretty interesting? Join Inca Challenge and get ready to train your brain while treating your fun senses in the optimum possible way! Once you try it out in your device, you will definitely recommend it to your friends and families to improve their memory. 

When you enter this html5 puzzle challenge, you would notice a few cards lying out in a grid and face down. Your objective is to flip cards and remove all the cards from the screen one by one. Only those two cards which are of the same will be eliminated from the screen. Keep turning cards over and over again until you spot the similar ones! No limits of flipping, but each puzzle can be solved out before the time expires. Track how time is left by looking at the bottom left corner of the screen!

There are 120 levels and 40 different cards to play through in this fun card game. Match pairs of cards with using as few moves as possible to complete each puzzle with 3 stars rating! Try to remember the position of the cards when they are turned over! Begin with the first level that is comparatively easier than the later ones! The possibilities are that you get puzzles in the advanced levels since every card looks the same. Good luck to challenge your brain in this cute memory game!
